summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 among FBI agents, a U.S. Attorney's Office contractor, and an Assistant U.S. Attorney, coordinating a call to discuss financial documents related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation. It includes instructions for burning subpoenaed financial records from American Express and Deutsche Bank to a disc for transfer to law enforcement.

persons.name: Hamilton
persons.context: A contractor with the U.S. Department of Justice who is asked to burn financial documents related to the Epstein investigation to a disc for law enforcement.

persons.name: Amanda
persons.context: An FBI personnel whom a sender requests to be included on a scheduled call about Epstein financial documents.

connections.description: Both are involved in the same investigation and are part of an email chain coordinating the review of financial documents related to Epstein.

events.title: Coordination call on Epstein financial documents
events.description: FBI agents and a U.S. Attorney's Office contractor schedule a call for 1:30 PM to discuss a game plan for analyzing financial documents subpoenaed in the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Request to burn financial records
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney instructs contractor Hamilton to burn folders containing subpoenaed financial records from American Express and Deutsche Bank related to the Epstein investigation to a disc for transfer to law enforcement.

locations: \Wsa.doj.gov\cloucANYS\StAndrews\SharecaUSvEpstein-2018R01618\InvestigationVI 2018 SDNY investigation\ Subpoena Returns\ American Express
\Wsa.doj.gov\cloucANYS\StAndrews\SharecaUSvEpstein-2018R01618kInvestigationVI 2018 SDNY investigation\ Subpoena Returns\ Deutsche Bank
keyFacts: The email chain shows active coordination in July 2019 between the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the financial investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.
Subpoenaed financial records from American Express and Deutsche Bank were being collected and transferred on physical discs for analysis.
A forensic accountant from the FBI squad was being brought onboard to assist with the investigation.
The communication highlights the procedural steps taken to secure and discuss evidence related to Epstein's finances.
